documents.document: We're also looking for people who have been invited to take part in the 100,000 Genomes project (whether they accepted or not). #Healthtalk
Very excited to launch this site with first post from @LLocock. Share your stories of pet/owner health and illness; https://t.co/PS0oMCWBns
Oh my. Revisiting extraordinary... https://t.co/bffuSfHtpg #JusticeforLB
@sallyephillips @TommyShakes @LookingUpBooks Check out #JusticeforLB https://t.co/MWs5gr3dTa 'tis simply magical.
@PhyllisStein2 @gmcuk Extraordinary.
Meanwhile Dr M is treating patients (kids) in Ireland who are unaware of the questions over her fitness to practice. @gmcuk #JusticeforLB
This cannot, in any way, be acceptable or necessary. What are they actually doing? It's an inhumane and barbaric process. #JusticeforLB
Blimey. Hoping the wheels of the @gmcuk tribunal don't turn as slowly as their investigations. Nearly 3 years since referral. #JusticeforLB
Loved by mum and mermaids... https://t.co/w7cUctXIG8 #JusticeforLB
We're looking for young people to share their experiences of psychosis; https://t.co/7rPMGRpDJa #healthtalk
@chrishattoncedr @coyle_mj Probably part of their induction. Sigh.
Too many docs for us to read so we paid some lawyers £250k to read em. Scratches head... @nmcnews https://t.co/1QjcmaW3EG
@coyle_mj Yep. Exactly that. Parking sense and integrity (if they have any) outside the office door. Hard to comprehend.
Just wondering what the fuck really. #motherblame #JusticeforLB
And when Sloven staff included sections in their witness statements about me, no one said 'This is utterly irrelevant'. #JusticeforLB
And when @OxfordshireCC circulated a secretly conducted review of me, no one said 'Why have you done this? It's wrong.' #JusticeforLB
And how no one sent the briefing to @DavidNichols0n accusing us of hacking and trolling, said 'Er, this is pretty outlandish'. #JusticeforLB
Thinking about how no one sent the briefing on my blog, the day after LB died, said 'Er, this really ain't appropriate'. #JusticeforLB
"We may have kidded people into thinking producing the report actually meant something." https://t.co/LMp283QHyz #CQCdeathsreview
I was at an @AoMRC patient and lay committee conference today. Everyone had heard about LB. Remarkable though it shouldn't be. #JusticeforLB
@GeorgeJulian I'm sure. Here's hoping.
The awkward returning to a sparkly initiative delivering (seemingly) crap all. Any other ERG members joining… https://t.co/aOHKLLNvSW
@GeorgeJulian Nope. And yet it still needs to. Shameful.
@JamesTitcombe @GeorgeJulian @nmcnews I'm not surprised. Good people are in touch, if only they could be open in their outrage... Sigh.
@GeorgeJulian No comment. #writeit
@JamesTitcombe @GeorgeJulian @nmcnews Quarter of a million spondoonies to ensure no transparency. Who is in charge of this muppetry?
@edanaming I know. When you think what that money could have been spent on... It is truly obscene.
Just blocked the rugseller ad. That blooming yellow rug reminded me too much of another yellow rug. #action #smallsteps
@BleakHLM Scandalous, simple as. Just awful for you.
@KayFSheldon @CommonsPACAC Ah, thought they'd chucked in the towel.
@BleakHLM @actnforchildren Sorry. It's brutal and completely unnecessary. Bastards.
@BleakHLM @mustntgrumble @actnforchildren Shameful, shameful behaviour. :(
@Metalliman38711 @JiveRuislip Yep. Slower than slow mcslow on a slow day.
Made the wrong split decision getting off the bus and on the tube at Hillingdon. #27stops 27...
@SharonAllison10 @AshtonsLegal 'Bereavement award' is an oxymoron.
@BleakHLM Reminds me of a character (maybe from the Beano) who stretched his limbs to fit into any available space. #weasilyshite
@JamesTitcombe @rhiannonwrites @tim2040 @nmcnews Trying/failing to imagine similar layers of protection/care applied to brutalised families.
@BleakHLM @JamesTitcombe @actnforchildren No words... Well, other than; https://t.co/zzn5fbddBs #howcouldanyonethinkthisisacceptable?
@HPIAndyCowper @JamesTitcombe Haha! This made me chuckle.
@jmcefalas @chrishattoncedr @JackSkinner81 @smclrk @b4eve @Cleverestcookie @MhairiBlack Agree. Shocking we're grubbing around though.
@tim2040 @JamesTitcombe @bainesy1969 @nmcnews @Fieldfisher Maybe it's a typo.
@tim2040 @JamesTitcombe @bainesy1969 @nmcnews What on earth did the £240k go on then? @Fieldfisher
@rhiannonwrites @tim2040 @JamesTitcombe @nmcnews @Fieldfisher On those very comfy, expensive mattresses ;)
@DebHazeldine It's so wrong. And there are so many of us saying exactly the same thing. Sigh.
@smclrk @chrishattoncedr No artifice, pomp or self importance. Just integrity and heart... [Don't let me down Norm ;)]
@DebHazeldine @JamesTitcombe @nmcnews Exactly. No change. No improvement. Complete power imbalance and families forced to battle.
@tim2040 @bainesy1969 @JamesTitcombe @nmcnews @Fieldfisher Sort of relieved, and sadly not surprised.
@SamSly2 @nmcnews @JamesTitcombe We had pages of black but think the Sloven muppets just did it in house (for once).
@tim2040 @bainesy1969... any thoughts? Is this typical/allowed? [thanks] https://t.co/JrDbtuUZvp
@SamSly2 @nmcnews @JamesTitcombe I know. How they can possibly justify it in any way... Scandalous. (And nasty).
@swindley @JamesTitcombe @nmcnews Yeah. You particularly complex (troublesome) person you. Almost [haha] relieved we're dealing with @gmcuk
@JamesTitcombe @nmcnews Surely a National Audit Office or summat issue? You can't waste public money like that.
@JamesTitcombe @nmcnews No words. Other than why?
Unbelievable. How can this possibly (possibly) be allowed? @nmcnews https://t.co/unMEX0rHRw
@DebraOliveri2 @nmcnews Yes, that's true. A start.
Two elderly men on the bus talking about crematoriums. 'How long does it take, like?' '2 hours, an hour and a half...' '2 hours, eh? Ah.'
@Cleverestcookie @JamesTitcombe @nmcnews Those who should be speaking up should do so or step down. Simple as.
@JamesTitcombe @nmcnews I don't think it matters what it contains, it should be public. Why not? Why the secrecy?
@JamesTitcombe @nmcnews No. They certainly do a number in harsh, brutal, brief, random letters. "Dear Mr Richard and Dr Ryan". #JusticeforLB
@k_runswick_cole @nmcnews Nah. Or any explanation of any processes. Interim order review hearings? #panelwhatpanel?
I think one of LB's nurses has been suspended pending a hearing but the letter from @nmcnews is completely unintelligible. #JusticeforLB
@mustntgrumble The @changepeople_ should be able to help you with this.
Consistent disregard for safety issues/fixation on reputation. It shouldn't have taken this long but thank fuck if they go. #JusticeforLB
Golly. Sounds like Alan Yates, Sloven chair agrees the board is unfit for purpose. Berryman, Spires et al. Get your coats. #JusticeforLB
@xcoffeezombiex Piercingly sad, from such chuckling.
'He stole a piece of my heart...' Sob. https://t.co/0haWnTfV98 #JusticeforLB
Late night hotel drink, hearing the dregs of a Masonic meeting. Lodge talk and other evangelical shite. #shudder
@jennywalkabout Haha. Large mugs of tea and bashed out a few lines... :))
Gawd. Stuck on that blooming letter from the @OxfordshireCC commissioner. Breaking my 'avoid too much negativity' scales. #bookwriting
@lucy_seren Harrowing... :(
@lucy_seren @getsurrey That is awful.
Odd (sad) report. What did the hospital plead guilty to? @BBCNews https://t.co/4QKcTjesL0
@yvonnecoghill1 @KayFSheldon @Crouchendtiger7 What's the WRES and SAG? (Sorry. Would like to understand his contribution better.)
Got into @SHIjournal 'top 10 articles mentioned across news and social media streams in 2016'. Whoo hoo. [Or woof woof].
@MarieS5trawberr @JustcultureTF Yes, that makes perfect sense.
Oh dear. Hearing of a 'Don't contact us, we'll contact you' response from the @JustcultureTF. What were those principles again?
Beautiful blog comment... https://t.co/QOYXjEFTR0 #JusticeforLB #heirloom
Did she really say that.
@MarkNeary1 Hahaha!!! The spoons... :)
@MarkNeary1 @AlexaDWilson Yes. Alexa is my auntie.
@MarkNeary1 Aww.. sorry mate. Happens all the time when you're Val Doonican's fake daughter. ;)
Just popped up on facebook. Six years ago today. How? #JusticeforLB https://t.co/hVanTJGGbz
@LizEllisPhD Exactly.
21st century UK. How can this possibly be? Utterly, utterly shameful. https://t.co/sDaPnFoFdR
@jennywalkabout Hopefully!
@AlexaDWilson I love it that my walk/bus to work involves a National Express route...
Book contract on it's way. Promising a rip roaring read, love, colour, collectivity, laughter. Swears/photos to be negotiated. #JusticeforLB
@Nolliag66 Yep. Pretty awkward. Think the heady fumes of human factor wonderment dull sense and sensibility in Hunt's playground.
@BleakHLM @actnforchildren I'm left, as always, wondering how they live with themselves. Must be a level of delusion.
@BleakHLM @actnforchildren It's such an enraging situation that you feel almost powerless in trying to hold em to account. #solidarity
@4AdsthePoet @KaraChrome @DEC_Oxford I thought you'd be interested.
@jennywalkabout Haha! Very impressive. :)
Fascinating talk by Paul Dark on diagnostic disruptions and sepsis. Lots of activity and limited progress. @DEC_Oxford
At @DEC_Oxford seminar on antimicrobial resistance. 6m urine samples sent for testing a year, 30% are contaminated. (Chris Butler).
@willcpowell Classy.
@benajohnson2 @alexander_minh That's the beauty of twitter :)
@SE25A @MartinBromiley Ah. Sorry. I didn't realise he was in charge of twitter.
@benajohnson2 I don't doubt he has which can only be good. Don't agree with fear and mistrust. What line was crossed (or whose?).
@benajohnson2 Not agreeing doesn't make the letter 'objectionable'. I don't agree with no comment for a start.
@MartinBromiley Sorry. I simply don't agree.
